main.bio: Hi there! I am Krishna Dayal Bohra, currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science from JECRC University, graduating in 2026. I am passionate about software development, web technologies, and continuously improving my technical skills. I'm actively working on projects and seeking opportunities to gain hands-on experience in the tech industry.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for collaborations or internships!
